description: Dumb-O-Meter is the result of thousands of years investigating the human nature. Well, not really...  With Dumb-O-Meter you can measure your intelligence, show your results to your friends, or better, invite your friends to make the test and enjoy their results.  Dumb-O-Meter is a joking app. There are ten questions you have to answer correctly in order to obtain the best score possible.  You have a limited time to answer each question, so try to answer as fast as possible.  The test results only shows the total number of correctly answered questions, and a description for each valoration.  All the values and descriptions are absolutely false, and are written trying to be sarcastic and ironic.  Feel free to invite your friends to do the test, you will enjoy seeing their faces.
